name: Good Cook Can Opener, Safe Cut Manual Can Opener, no Sharp Can Edges, Black
short_description: HANDS-FREE LID DISPOSAL: This can top remover lifts the lid off and holds it until you’re ready to dispose of it. Just pivot the handle to release the lid into the trash. There is no need to ever touch the lid to dispose. REUSE LIDS FOR STORAGE: Cut lids have a clean, safe edge that is suitable for short-term storage of leftover food. Pop the lid back on the can and refrigerate until you’re ready to finish your food. NO CROSS CONTAMINATION: With this safe cut can opener, the cutting wheel never contacts the food, so there's no chance of contamination. Open cans with peace of mind, even for messy contents. STURDY CHROME CONSTRUCTION: Crafted from durable chrome, this manual can opener is built to last through years of daily use. It feels substantial in your hand and operates smoothly every time. EFFORTLESS & SECURE: Designed to be safe and easy to use, this smooth-edged can opener cuts efficiently without creating sharp edges. The ergonomic handles provide a firm, comfortable grip.
product_description: Safely and easily open your canned goods with the GoodCook Safe Cut Can Opener. This manual can opener features a unique design that effortlessly opens cans without leaving any sharp edges, and the guide wire lifts the lid from the can once cut fully open so you can safely remove it. Simply rotate the turn knob to release the lid from the opener - with no sharp edges, the lid can be reused as a cover for temporary storage. The durable plastic handle and non-slip turn knob provide a secure grip for additional safety. This handheld can opener is designed with a hardened stainless steel cutting blade and thick stainless steel guide wire for durability and long-lasting use, and it is easy to clean. For over 30 years, GoodCook has created the tools that have made life in the kitchen easier and more enjoyable. As we’ve grown, we strived to stay on trend and continually incorporate more function and value into our kitchenware products. We take pride in the fact that GoodCook products are being used every day, and that our name is recognized as a helpful resource supplying products, recipes and inspiration for home cooks across America.

name: Electric Can Opener, One Touch Switch Automatic Can Opener Smooth Edge for Almost Size Cans, Best Kitchen Gadgets Food-Safe Electric Can Openers for Seniors with Arthritis
short_description: Your Kitchen-Must-Have: Just press the button to start, 360° rotate around the can and automatically close, hands free, free up your time to do more things in the kitchen! Eliminates Sharp Lid Edges: . The blade of can opener cuts along the side of the lid without touching the food inside, without worry about any sharp edges. Electric can opener makes cutting safer than other manual can opener. Portable Design: This can opener’s compact design fits neatly in small kitchens and offers an easy, comfortable grip. Simply tuck it into a kitchen drawer until you need it. Easily Open Cans: Can opener electric perfect for almost most sizes cans (excluding rimless cans and peculiar-shaped cans). It is a great help for the kitchen. Battery Can Opener: Only powered by 2 AA batteries (not included), it is portable and less noisy, don’t require a separate power source. The battery can be easily replaced by taking off the lid on the rear. 2025 Great Gifts: Perfect for seniors, women, and people with arthritis. The electric can opener is a good gift to express love to family and friends on festival. TIPS: If you can't remove the electric can opener, look at the back for the can opener, press the turn button on the bottom, move the can slowly, and the blade will turn. You can do it!

name: Cuisinart CCO-75 Side-Cut Can Opener, 9.35 Inches
short_description: Side-cut blade opens cans safely and smoothly Opens can along the side of the lid eliminating any sharp edges and minimizing contact with food For use with most standard and pull-tab cans of any size Single-touch operation Large, easy-press push-down activation lever makes it easy for anyone to use
product_description: Now you can safely and smoothly remove lids from most pop-top or regular cans of all sizes. The Cuisinart® Side-Cut Electric Can Opener features a precision cutting mechanism that opens cans along the side of the lid, leaving edges smooth and minimizing contact with food. Simply press the large push-down lever to activate the blade for effortless lid removal. With an extra-wide base that won’t tip or slip, this durable and dependable can opener is the fuss-free way to remove lids for all your cooking needs.

name: Hamilton Beach Extra-Tall Electric Automatic Can Opener with Easy-Clean Detachable Cutting Lever, Cord Storage, Knife Sharpener, Brushed Stainless Steel (76700)
short_description: EASY TO CLEAN: The washable cutting lever on the electric can opener easily removes to rinse clean under the faucet. OPEN TALLER CANS — EXTRA-TALL DESIGN: With its extra-tall design, this automatic can opener easily opens a wide range of different-sized cans from small to large, including taller cans. AUTOMATIC SHUTOFF. This Hamilton Beach can opener automatically shuts off, freeing your hands for other kitchen tasks. BUILT-IN KNIFE SHARPENER: Keep all your kitchen knives sharp without having to buy a separate sharpening tool. REDUCE CLUTTER: Cord storage at the base of the can opener helps keep countertops and cabinets clutter-free. #1 BRAND IN CAN OPENERS IN THE U.S.*: Consumers love our can openers. We are the best-selling can opener brand in America.
product_description: Clear out your drawer full of kitchen gadgets – this Hamilton Beach can opener not only opens cans from small to large, it also has a built-in knife sharpener. With an extra-tall design, you can easily fit larger cans under the stainless steel, electric cutting blade. The cutting unit automatically shuts off once it’s done and removes for easy cleaning. The cord fits into its own area for neat storage.

name: 3 in 1 Under the Cabinet Electric Can Opener, Blade Sharpener, Bottle Opener, Under The Counter Mount, For Large And Small Cans (Black)
short_description: Space Saver Blade Sharpener: Quickly and safely sharpen your knives and blades without taking up any counter space; Suitable for all Western-style blades for sharpening and honing and doubles as a bag cutter if you are in a pinch Electric Can Opener: Quickly remove can and jar lids with our under-the-cabinet smooth edge can opener that does all the work for you; Its easy-to-use swing grip and magnetic lid provide comfort and execution during everyday use; In addition, the automatic openers can accommodate most can sizes Easy Installation: Installs easily under a cabinet to save on space; plus, the power cord stores in the back of the unit so you can use the exact length you need without creating clutter; Dimensions (insert unit dimensions)

name: Ultrablde SE - USB Rechargeable Electric Can Opener for Kitchen for Seniors with Arthritis- Cordless Battery Powered Automatic, Side Cut, Smooth Edge, Handsfree, for Small or Large Cans, Grey
short_description: 【Modern Tech for Easy Can Opening】– Beauty, brains and power.The Canslab Ultrablade Series brings kitchen can opener into modern times with its powerful motor, easy-to-use design, and stylish appearance. Reduced noise, faster and more steady cutting, rechargeable battery, ultra-fast USB charging, easy one touch operation, magnetic lid lifter, smooth edge, food safe, easy storage are some of the enhanced features built into the sleek and ergonomic black electric can opener. 【Reduced Nosie and Faster Speed】–The robust industrial leading motor enables the Canslab automatic can opener to open cans with 28% less noise and 28% more speed, compared with the old fashioned aa battery type can opener. Just press the easy-touch start/stop button for hands-free, painless use. 【USB Rechargeable】- Canslab USB rechargeable can opener has a built-in 2000mAh rechargeable battery that opens approximately 100 cans*, which is 4 times the quantity cut by the aa batteries type until the batteries are drained. It is a cost-effective choice. Best for home kitchen and outdoor camping. *Data from Canslab lab, can sized 10.75oz. The number of cans opened may vary depending on the size of the can. 【Side Cut Tech for Smooth Edge】 - The heavy duty hands free can opener cuts along the side of the lid rather than the top leaving a safe smooth edge, without touching the food inside. The underside magnet catch the lid and makes it easy to remove the lid. There is built-in retractable lid picker to help easily remove lids from sticky food cans or high-pressure ones. 【Suitable for Small and Lager Cans 】- Canslab Can Opener Electric is a portable must-have kitchen gadgets. It fits practically any sizes can (not for rimless soda cans) , and gives you the best hands-free experience when preparing food. Hands-free operation are particularly beneficial for the seniors with arthritis or anyone facing challenges gripping, one-handed and left handed folks, or anyone searching for a more quicker way to open cans.

name: Cooks Professional Electric Can Opener,Automatic Can Openers for Seniors, Arthritic Patients A Great Kitchen Gadget,Hands Free Operation Can Openers,One Touch Design (Black)
short_description: 【EFFORTLESS CAN OPENING】 Cooks Professional electric tin opener does all the hard work for you with its one-touch operation. Just place it on the can, press the button, and watch the automatic can opener effortlessly spin around, leaving you with a perfectly opened can every time.（This can opener is set to close at a scheduled time of 25 seconds and cannot be automatically closed） 【DESIGNED FOR EVERYONE】Whether you're right-handed or left-handed, the versatile design of our can openers that work caters to all. It's also a game-changer for those with joint or muscle issues. Let us take the strain off your hands and make a can opening a breeze, so you can enjoy your favourite foods. 【SAFE AND CLEAN LID REMOVAL】After the tin can opener has completed its job, the built-in magnet gracefully lifts the lid off, leaving you with a smooth, clean edge. It's a simple and safe way to dispose of the lid, ensuring your kitchen stays clean and hazard-free. 【CORDLESS CONVENIENCE】The electric can opener is cordless, giving you the freedom to use it wherever you need it most. Whether you're in your kitchen or hosting a picnic, our electric tin openers for arthritis hands are powered by just 2 AA batteries (not included) for ultimate convenience. 【Compact and Portable】 With its exquisite design and lightweight, this can opener is easy to store, making it your ideal option for outdoor picnics, camping, or travel

name: BLACK+DECKER EasyCut Extra-Tall Can Opener, EC500B, Removable Multi-Tool, Knife Sharpener, One-Touch Lever
short_description: Removable Cutting Assembly - The cutting assembly can be removed and reattached for easy cleaning. EasyCut Blade Technology - The cutting blade slices through lids as the can spins in place on the stable base. One-Touch Lever - Easily retrieve cans once the lid is removed with the easy-press lever. Stabilizing Wide Base - The optimized design works with most can sizes and remains stable on the countertop. Removable Multi-Tool - Remove bottle caps and pop-tops using the multi-tool, stored conveniently in the back of the unit.
product_description: Simplify everyday kitchen tasks with the BLACK+DECKER EasyCut Extra-Tall Can Opener. The tall, wide design accommodates most can sizes, and the EasyCut Blade Technology easily pierces cans for fast lid removal. The unit includes a built-in knife sharpener and a multi-tool that removes bottle caps and pop-tops. In one compact device you get: can opener, knife sharpener, bottle opener, and pop-top remover.

name: Cuisinart Deluxe Stainless Steel Electric Can Opener
short_description: Stainless steel construction Power Cut™ blade One-touch operation Opens any standard size can Removable activation lever for easy cleanup
product_description: With one touch, the Cuisinart® Deluxe Stainless Steel Can Opener makes short work of any standard size can. The precision Power Cut™ blade effortlessly slices through cans, held in place by the handy magnetic lid holder. Cuisinart® designed the arm to be removable, making cleanup effortless. The freestanding can opener has an extra-wide base to prevent tipping, while the clean lines of the brushed stainless steel complement any other premium countertop appliances for luxury chef’s kitchen.
